content: this is a crochet tea cosy pattern suitable for stump teapots it s great for using up small amounts of leftover worsted yarn as you ll need around 20 grams or 40 - 50 metres designed for a small 2 cup teapot there are suggestions for enlarging it but please note these haven t been tested yet it has sections worked in the round and sections worked in row to allow for spout and handle holes
